analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein provides financial analysis to New York Times reporter Landon Thomas Jr. about Saudi royal family finances, discussing how Saudi wealth is invested in private equity funds and analyzing geopolitical implications of the 9/11 Saudi bill and social media's impact on public perceptions of wealth inequality.
